issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Refactor dataset's API to use Result<T>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7147](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7147). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should make this switch before the API settles
